name: Thomas the defender
description:
Battle against waves of enemies, and see how your actions change the outcome of the war.

This was a game made in 48 hours for this game jam: https://itch.io/jam/pizza-jam4, I was a bit late on the submission so it didn't get submitted in time. The theme for the game jam was any of the seven deadly sins, the way I tried to include it was by having several ways of finishing a battle and have that effect something, in this prototype I included several endings that can be reached by sticking to a path.
